bibliographic-data.invention-title: HAUSGERÃTEWANDUNGSANORDNUNG UND VERFAHREN ZUR BEFESTIGUNG VON WANDUNGSTEILEN BEI EINEM HAUSGERÃT
DOMESTIC APPLIANCE WALL ARRANGEMENT AND METHOD FOR FIXING WALL PARTS IN A DOMESTIC APPLIANCE
AGENCEMENT DE PAROIS D'UN APPAREIL MÃNAGER ET PROCÃDÃ DE FIXATION D'ÃLÃMENTS PAROI D'UN APPAREIL MÃNAGER

addressbook.orgname: BSH Bosch und Siemens HausgerÃ¤te GmbH

abstract.p: The invention relates to a domestic appliance wall arrangement, in particular, an oven wall arrangement, comprising at least two wall parts (16, 18), fixed together by means of a welded joint (34). According to the invention, a long-lasting and robust connection of the wall pieces to each other may be achieved, wherein the welded joint (34) extends through at least one of the wall pieces (18).
